emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of annual membership drive workers including P.L. Prattis, seated on right, and Curtis B. Haines, third from right, posed in  Centre Avenue YMCA
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 7, 1953, pg. 6 reads: "Proud Of Fame - Workers in the annual membership drive for the Centre Avenue "Y" who made the Hall of Fame by bringing in more than $100 in memberships are pictured above. Their picture was taken at the post-scheduled campaign meeting last Friday night.  A total of 1,547 members and $8,554 in cash was reported.  The goals were 1,800 members and $10,000 in cash.  Nineteen of the best workers volunteered to keep on working to reach the 10,000 goal. - Harris Photo"
